newsitem.title: UK: UK meals and feeds lower, buyers sidelined.
newsitem.headline: UK meals and feeds lower, buyers sidelined.

text.p: UK meals and feeds prices were lower on Monday in anticipation of a sharp fall on the Chicago futures market.
Forecasts for the U.S. Midwest were calling for rain during the early part of the week in the main soybean growing areas.
Sellers in the UK lowered ex-mill high protein soymeal asking prices by around two stg while stores were as much as 2.50 stg down.
Rapemeal from the Liverpool and Hull mills was one stg down to unchanged while the Erith mill was between two and four stg lower.
However, brokers said buyers were not showing any interest.
"The buyers think the market's going to come lower and they won't move for the moment," said one.
